alert.note: Alert for Natrona County Lower Elevations; Northeast Johnson County; Southeast Johnson County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued October 05 at 1:34PM MDT until October 07 at 10:00AM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 10 AM MDT FRIDAY... ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE FRIDAY NIGHT THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Frost Advisory, temperatures as low as 30 will result in frost formation. For the Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 26 are possible. * WHERE...Northeast Johnson County, Southeast Johnson County and Natrona County Lower Elevations. * WHEN...For the Frost Advisory, from 4 AM to 10 AM MDT Friday. For the Freeze Watch, from late Friday night through Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation, and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Natrona County Lower Elevations; Northeast Johnson County; Southeast Johnson County
